trans-unit.source: Provides a mechanism that data-bound controls use to request data-related operations from data source controls when data is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 提供一個機制，用來擷取資料時，要求資料相關作業從資料來源控制項的資料繫結控制項。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls use the DataSourceSelectArguments class to request that a data source control performs additional data-related operations on a result set, such as sorting the data or returning a specific subset of data.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項使用 DataSourceSelectArguments 類別要求資料來源控制項執行結果集，例如排序資料，或傳回特定資料子集上的其他資料相關作業。

trans-unit.source: These data-related operations are enumerated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 這些資料相關作業列舉的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>列舉型別。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>

trans-unit.source: The following table indicates how the DataSourceSelectArguments class supports these data-related operations.
trans-unit.target: 下表指出 DataSourceSelectArguments 類別如何支援這些資料相關的作業。

trans-unit.source: |Capability|Related DataSourceSelectArguments properties| |----------------|--------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A>| Data-bound controls explicitly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> method to bind data, which calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> method of the data source control they are associated with.
trans-unit.target: |功能 |相關的 DataSourceSelectArguments 屬性 | |----------------|--------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A>| 資料繫結控制項明確呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>繫結資料，呼叫方法<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29>它們相關聯資料來源控制項的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In this way, the data-bound control retrieves data from the data source control on demand.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，資料繫結控制項，請從資料來源控制項，視擷取資料。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> method accepts a DataSourceSelectArguments parameter, the data-bound control is responsible for creating and managing a DataSourceSelectArguments object and passing it to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> method when it retrieves data from the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29>方法接受 DataSourceSelectArguments 參數、 資料繫結控制項負責建立和管理 DataSourceSelectArguments 物件以及將其傳遞至<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29>方法從資料來源控制項擷取資料時。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29>

trans-unit.source: In some cases, data-bound controls might not need any additional data-related capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，資料繫結控制項可能不需要任何額外的資料相關功能。

trans-unit.source: In this case, data-bound controls pass an <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty%2A> arguments object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，將資料繫結控制項傳遞<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty%2A>引數物件至<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty%2A>

trans-unit.source: For sorted result sets, data-bound controls check a data source view's <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanSort%2A> property at run time, and add a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> capability using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項的已排序的結果集，檢查資料來源檢視的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanSort%2A>屬性在執行階段及加入<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>功能使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanSort%2A>

trans-unit.source: As a separate operation, the data-bound control can request a sorted result set from a data source control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> property on the DataSourceSelectArguments object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項可以為個別的作業，要求設定資料來源控制項，藉由設定排序的結果<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>DataSourceSelectArguments 物件上的屬性傳遞至<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: For paging scenarios, data-bound controls check a data source view's <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanPage%2A> property at run time, and add a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> capability using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項分頁的情況下，檢查資料來源檢視的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanPage%2A>屬性在執行階段及加入<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>功能使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: As a separate operation, the data-bound control can request a subset of data from a data source control for paging by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> properties on the DataSourceSelectArguments object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 為個別的作業，資料繫結控制項可以要求資料的子集用於分頁的資料來源控制項的設定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>DataSourceSelectArguments 物件上的內容傳遞至<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a total row count for paging scenarios, data-bound controls check a data source view's <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A> property at run time, and add a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> capability using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取分頁案例總計資料列計數，資料繫結控制項檢查資料來源檢視的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>屬性在執行階段及加入<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>功能使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: As a separate operation, the data-bound control can request a total row count from a data source control for paging by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A> property on the DataSourceSelectArguments object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 為個別的作業，資料繫結控制項可以要求總計資料列計數分頁的資料來源控制項的設定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>DataSourceSelectArguments 物件上的屬性傳遞至<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> method returns, the total row count is contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29>方法傳回時，所包含的總計資料列計數<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If any of the DataSourceSelectArguments properties are set, but the currently bound data source control does not support the requested capability, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is thrown when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果有任何 DataSourceSelectArguments 屬性設定，但目前繫結的資料來源控制項不支援要求的功能，<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>擲回例外狀況時<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新的預設執行個體的<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The default constructor creates an instance of the class with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> property initialized to <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> properties initialized to zero.
trans-unit.target: 預設建構函式會建立與類別的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>屬性初始化為<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>屬性初始化為零。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> </xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> class with the specified sort expression.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>類別指定的排序運算式。

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceSelectArguments constructor creates an instance of the class with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> initialized with the specified expression and the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> properties initialized to zero.
trans-unit.target: DataSourceSelectArguments 建構函式會建立與類別的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>初始化使用指定的運算式和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>屬性初始化為零。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: A sort expression that data source controls use to sort the result of a data retrieval operation before the result is returned to a caller.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源控制項用來排序的資料擷取作業結果，結果傳回至呼叫端前的排序運算式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> class with the specified starting position and number of rows to return for paging scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>類別具有指定的開始位置和分頁案例所傳回的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceSelectArguments constructor creates an instance of the class with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> initialized to <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> properties initialized to the values provided for the `startRowIndex` and `maximumRows` parameters.
trans-unit.target: DataSourceSelectArguments 建構函式會建立與類別的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>初始化為<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>屬性初始化為所提供的值為`startRowIndex`和`maximumRows`參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> </xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the data row that marks the beginning of data returned by a data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 標記資料擷取作業所傳回的資料開頭的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of rows that a data retrieval operation returns.
trans-unit.target: 資料擷取作業傳回的資料列的數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> class with the specified sort expression, starting position, and number of rows to return for paging scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>類別，其中包含指定的排序運算式開始的位置，針對分頁案例所傳回的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: A sort expression that data source controls use to sort the result of a data retrieval operation before the result is returned to a caller.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源控制項用來排序的資料擷取作業結果，結果傳回至呼叫端前的排序運算式。

trans-unit.source: The index of the data row that marks the beginning of data returned by a data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 標記資料擷取作業所傳回的資料開頭的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of rows that a data retrieval operation returns.
trans-unit.target: 資料擷取作業傳回的資料列的數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Adds one capability to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> instance, which is used to compare supported capabilities and requested capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 加入一個功能<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>執行個體，用來比較支援的功能，以及要求功能。

trans-unit.source: Data source controls call the AddSupportedCapabilities method for each capability the data source supports.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源控制項呼叫 AddSupportedCapabilities 方法，針對每個資料來源支援的功能。

trans-unit.source: After the capabilities are added, any call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29> method compares the supported capabilities against the requested capabilities (represented by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> properties).
trans-unit.target: 新增功能後，呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29>方法會比較要求的功能對支援的功能 (由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>屬性)。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a capability such as <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities> is not added but the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29> method throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果一項功能，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>不會加入但<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>設定屬性，則<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29>方法會擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>例外狀況。</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object with the sort expression set to <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>與排序運算式設定為<xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty>物件

trans-unit.source: The property returns a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object created with the default <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.%23ctor> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 屬性會傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>建立預設物件<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.%23ctor>建構函式。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.%23ctor> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: You can use the Empty property when you want to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%29> method of a data source view class without any additional arguments.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用空白的屬性，當您想要呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%29>沒有任何其他引數的資料來源檢視類別的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%29>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> instance is equal to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>執行個體是否等於目前的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> class overrides the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to test equality using the various properties of the objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>類別覆寫<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法來測試使用的各種屬性的物件是否相等。</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> properties are all equal in value, the Equals method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A>屬性是所有的值相等，則等於方法會傳回`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> to compare with the current one.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref>要與目前比較。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> is equal to the current instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>等於目前的執行個體，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回雜湊碼<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>型別。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊碼<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the maximum number of data rows that a data source control returns for a data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示為資料擷取作業傳回的資料來源控制項的資料列的數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The MaximumRows property supports paging scenarios.
trans-unit.target: MaximumRows 屬性支援分頁的案例。

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls check a data source view's <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanPage%2A> property at run time, and add a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> capability using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29> method if the view supports paging.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項，請檢查資料來源檢視的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanPage%2A>屬性在執行階段及加入<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>功能使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29>方法如果檢視支援分頁。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the data-bound control fails to add the capability, and the paging properties are set on a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object passed to the data source view during a data retrieval operation, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception might be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料繫結控制項無法加入功能，且分頁會設定的屬性上<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>資料擷取作業時，傳遞到資料來源檢視物件<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>可能會擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: The data-bound control can request a subset of data from a data source control for paging by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> and MaximumRows properties on the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項可以藉由設定用於分頁的資料來源控制項的中要求的資料子集<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>和 MaximumRows 屬性上的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>物件傳遞至<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If any of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> properties are set, but the currently bound data source control does not support the requested capability, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is thrown when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 若有任何<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>設定的屬性，但目前繫結的資料來源控制項不支援要求的功能，<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>擲回例外狀況時<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of data rows that a data source returns for a data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 資料擷取作業會傳回資料來源的資料列的數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0, which indicates that all possible data rows are returned.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 0，表示傳回所有可能的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Compares the capabilities requested for an <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%29> operation against those that the specified data source view supports.
trans-unit.target: 會比較要求的功能<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%29>作業對指定的資料來源檢視的支援。

trans-unit.source: The RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError method is used by data-bound controls to compare additional requested capabilities represented by the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> class, such as the ability to sort or page through a result set, with the capabilities supported by the data source view.
trans-unit.target: RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError 方法用於資料繫結控制項所比較的屬性所表示的其他要求的功能<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>類別，例如可以排序或分頁結果集，資料來源檢視所支援的功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: The view calls its own <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilityError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29> method for each possible capability defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 檢視會呼叫其本身<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilityError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29>方法中定義的每個可能功能<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>列舉型別。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilityError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If any of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> properties are set, but the currently bound data source control does not support the requested capability, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is thrown when the RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError method is called.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果任何一個<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>設定的屬性，但目前繫結的資料來源控制項不支援要求的功能， <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError 方法呼叫時，會擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: The data source view that performs the data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 執行資料擷取作業的資料來源檢視。

trans-unit.source: The data source view does not support the data source capability specified.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源檢視不支援指定的資料來源功能。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a data source control should retrieve a count of all the data rows during a data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出資料來源控制項是否應該在資料擷取作業期間擷取的所有資料列計數。

trans-unit.source: The RetrieveTotalRowCount property supports paging scenarios.
trans-unit.target: RetrieveTotalRowCount 屬性支援分頁的案例。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` to request a total row count from the data source control during the data-retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 將此屬性設定為`true`資料擷取作業期間，從資料來源控制項要求總計資料列計數。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine whether a data source view supports retrieving a total row count.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性來判斷資料來源的檢視是否支援擷取資料列總數。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the data source supports it, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> property is set by the data source control during the course of a data retrieval operation and the total data row count is returned in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> property, much as a value is returned in an output parameter of a method.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源支援此功能，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A>屬性由資料來源控制項的資料擷取作業過程中設定而且總計資料列計數會傳回在<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A>屬性，大部分做為值參數中傳回輸出的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If any of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> properties are set, but the currently bound data source control does not support the requested capability, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is thrown when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 若有任何<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>設定的屬性，但目前繫結的資料來源控制項不支援要求的功能，<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>擲回例外狀況時<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data source control should retrieve a total data row count; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果資料來源控制項應該擷取總資料的資料列數。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an expression that the data source view uses to sort the data retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料來源檢視用來排序擷取的資料運算式<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法。

trans-unit.source: The SortExpression property supports sorting scenarios.
trans-unit.target: SortExpression 屬性支援排序的案例。

trans-unit.source: A string that the data source view uses to sort data retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源檢視用來排序資料所擷取的字串<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String.Empty> is returned if sort expression has not been set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String.Empty>如果未設定排序運算式傳回的。</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the starting position the data source control should use when retrieving data rows during a data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示資料擷取作業期間擷取的資料列時，應該使用資料來源控制項的開始位置。

trans-unit.source: The StartRowIndex property supports paging scenarios.
trans-unit.target: StartRowIndex 屬性支援分頁的案例。

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls check a data source view's <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanPage%2A> property at run time, and add a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> capability using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29> method if the view supports paging.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項，請檢查資料來源檢視的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanPage%2A>屬性在執行階段及加入<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>功能使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29>方法如果檢視支援分頁。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the data-bound control fails to add the capability, and the paging properties are set on a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object passed to the data source view during a data retrieval operation, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception might be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料繫結控制項無法加入功能，且分頁會設定的屬性上<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>資料擷取作業時，傳遞到資料來源檢視物件<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>可能會擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: As a separate operation, the data-bound control can request a subset of data from a data source control by setting the StartRowIndex and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> properties on the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 為個別的作業，資料繫結控制項可以要求的資料子集從資料來源控制項藉由設定 StartRowIndex 和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>物件傳遞至<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The starting row position from which a data source control retrieves data.
trans-unit.target: 開始從資料來源控制項的資料列位置擷取資料。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0, which indicates that the starting position is the beginning of the result set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0，這表示的開始位置是結果集的開頭。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of rows retrieved during a data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料擷取作業期間所擷取的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: The TotalRowCount property supports paging scenarios.
trans-unit.target: TotalRowCount 屬性支援分頁的案例。

trans-unit.source: Data source and data source view controls differ in their internal implementation for how to retrieve total row counts.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源和資料來源檢視的控制項如何擷取資料列總數的內部實作的不同。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine whether a data source view supports retrieving a total row count during a data-retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性來判斷是否要檢視資料來源支援的資料擷取作業期間擷取資料列總數。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the data source supports it, the TotalRowCount property is set by the data source control during the course of a data-retrieval operation, and the total data row count is returned in the TotalRowCount property, much as a value is returned in an output parameter of a method.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源會支援它，TotalRowCount 屬性由資料來源控制項所設定的資料擷取作業過程中，總計資料列計數會傳回 TotalRowCount 屬性一樣方法輸出參數中傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: The total number of data rows retrieved by the data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 資料擷取作業所擷取的資料列的總數。
